features_implemented: Home page with hero, navigation entry points, and learning paths
Documentation page with sidebar, search, and code snippets
Tutorials page with difficulty filter, search, and step lists
Examples gallery with tag filter and detail page containing canvas placeholder and snippet
3D Basics page with educational content and diagram placeholders
Responsive, accessible navigation bar and footer
Three.js demo placeholder in detail page
notes: All required pages, routing, and mock data implemented. Tailwind and TypeScript configured with Vite; navigation is responsive with accessible form controls.
